summary: The primary source root for the vastctl core library, serving as the entry point for the vastctl_core package. It encapsulates the foundational logic for GPU provisioning, remote execution, and cloud infrastructure management on Vast.ai.
responsibilities: Act as the root container for all core library logic
Expose the vastctl_core package to the build system and installers
Organize domain models and service logic for Vast.ai interactions
Provide the structural foundation for GPU instance registry and telemetry
